author: nate_the_lego_great
title: 7236-2-police car 2008
review: weeooo weeooo! Here comes the LEGO police car. The LEGO police car was a great set. it was very fun to build and had a cool look. the parts were very good and i loved the double windshield but i wish the clocking tool could fit in the car. when i got this set, it was already discontinued. I really wanted it because i loved the design. It looks great on my shelves and is fun to push around. It really is a fun set.

author: Mask_of_Control
title: VERY GOOD SET
review:
I bought this set in 2008 to continue my collection of LEGO CITY.
I was lucky to get it because he was the last one in the store.

PROS

Good minifigure

Good vehicle

Radar gun

Good price

Good stickers

CONS

Nothing

The set is small but very good.
I highly recommend buying this set.
